item.title: facebookresearch/sam-3d-body
item.description: The repository provides code for running inference with the SAM 3D Body Model (3DB), links for downloading the trained model checkpoints and datasets, and example notebooks that show how to use the model.

item.title: facebookresearch/MHR
item.description: Momentum Human Rig is an anatomically-inspired parametric full-body digital human model developed at Meta. It includes: A parametric body skeletal model; A realistic 3D mesh skinned to the skeleton with levels of detail;A body blendshape and pose corrective model; A facial blendshape model.Its design is friendly for both CG and CV communities.
